problem.p: How much stronger is steel than nylon?

choicegroup.label: How much stronger is steel than nylon?
choicegroup.choice: Steel is 2 times stronger than nylon
Steel is 3 times stronger than nylon
Steel is 4 times stronger than nylon
Steel is 5 times stronger than nylon

div.p: Hint: You should be able to figure out by the allowable load for a funicular form using a steel cable by the allowable load for a nylon cable of the exact shape and diameter.
